Plan1.Goal: Gradually increase muscle mass and improve overall fitness with gentle, low-impact exercises.

Exercises.Description: Start slow, gradually increase pace over time.
Low-impact on joints, good for building muscle and coordination.

Plan1.Day2: Rest - Allow your body to recover.

Exercises.Description: Use bodyweight or light resistance bands for squats, lunges, arm raises. Focus on proper form over heavy weights.

Plan1.Day4_5: Rest - Give your body time to adapt.
Plan1.Day7: Rest or light activity like stretching.

Plan2.Goal: Increase intensity and duration from Plan 1 to build muscle and improve fitness.

Exercises.Description: Maintain a pace that elevates your heart rate.
Similar exercises as Plan 1, consider increasing weight/resistance slightly.

Plan2.Day2: Rest or Active Recovery (light yoga, walking).

Exercises.Description: Maintain flexibility and range of motion.

Plan2.Day4: Rest - Allow your body to recover.

Exercises.Description: Focus on hamstrings, quads, and calves.

Day1.Cardiovascular Exercise: 30 minutes of brisk walking or light jogging
Day1.Strength Training: Bodyweight exercises (push-ups, squats, lunges) - 3 sets of 12 repetitions each
Day1.Flexibility: 10 minutes of yoga focusing on flexibility

Plan3.Day2: Rest or Light Activity: Gentle activities like walking or light stretching for 30 minutes

Day3.Cardiovascular Exercise: 35 minutes of cycling or elliptical training

Day4.Strength Training: Resistance band exercises (rows, chest presses) - 3 sets of 12 repetitions each

Day5.Strength Training: Dumbbell exercises (shoulder presses, bicep curls) - 3 sets of 10 repetitions each

Plan3.Day6: Rest or Light Activity: Active recovery with light activities like leisurely cycling or walking for 30 minutes
Plan3.Day7: Active Recovery: Engage in gentle activities like Tai Chi or gentle yoga for 40 minutes focusing on relaxation and flexibility

Day1.Focus: Low-impact cardiovascular exercise, improve joint mobility and range of motion.

Day3.Focus: Build muscle strength for improved daily functioning and future exercise progression.

Day5.Focus: Improve cardiovascular health, maintain joint mobility.
